meanings.definition: The light or glow of the sun at sunrise or sunset.
meanings.sent1: The sunglow painted the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent2: She admired the sunglow as it slowly disappeared below the horizon.
meanings.sent3: The sunglow seemed to wink at her playfully.
meanings.sent4: The sunglow embraced the world in its warm embrace.
meanings.sent5: The sunglow cast a magical spell over the landscape.

meanings.definition: A warm, golden color resembling the light of the sun.
meanings.sent1: Her dress shimmered in a lovely sunglow hue.
meanings.sent2: The room was painted in a soothing sunglow shade.
meanings.sent3: The sunglow color of the walls made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a burst of sunglow in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sunglow of the painting brought warmth to the cold room.
